title: Can't gift skt t1 zac
body: Hello, my cousin have some rp to spare and he wanted to gift me skt t1 zac but it didn't pop up after he searched zac in the gift skin search bar.  Then he just search skt t1 and none of the skin popped up. Can we not gift legacy skin?

replies.body: Indeed, legacy skins aren't giftable unless it's actively available in the store.  You'll want to wait for him to appear through the store, or you can try your luck through a mystery gift.  Good luck!!
